practice_phrases: She followed me
她跟着我
She followed me here
她跟着我这里
She followed me home
她跟着我家
She followed me to the station
她跟着我到车站
She followed me and told me something
她跟着我告诉我一些事情
She followed me home yesterday
她昨天跟着我家
She followed me to see the mountains
她跟着我看到山
She followed me to the station every morning
她每天早上跟着我到车站
She followed me and told me she wanted to leave
她跟着我告诉我她想离开
She followed me home and told me she'd just seen the last bus leaving the station
她跟着我家告诉我她刚看到最后一班公交车离开车站
